attributes.action: Hold a referendum on any new European Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that the European Constitution is being resurrected by the Germans, and in all likelihood the Government will not hold a referendum on it. Given the importance of this issue, the people of the UK should be allowed to determine whether or not we sign up to it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
